free.question: Is This App Free?
free.answer: Yes. Ozone will launch as a free platform supported by ads. A premium, ad-free option will be available later.

creatorUpload.question: Will this platform allow creator to upload their video?
creatorUpload.answer: Yes. Creators will be able to upload content after completing a simple verification process.

creatorEarn.question: Will creators earn money on Ozone?
creatorEarn.answer: Yes. Monetization features such as ads, analytics, and rewards will be available for verified creators.

launch.question: When will Ozone officially launch?
launch.answer: We are currently in the preparation and testing phase. Early users who pre-register will be the first to get updates, special premium offers and early access.

recommendation.question: How does Ozone's recommendation system work?
recommendation.answer: Our AI recommendation engine suggests content based on your interests, without disrupting your feed or overwhelming you with irrelevant content.

watchToEarn.question: What is Watch-to-Earn on Ozone?
watchToEarn.answer: Watch-to-Earn lets viewers collect tokens every time they watch or engage with content. Over time, tokens can be exchanged for rewards or cashed out once you hit the minimum amount.
